content.question: Which of the following best explains the long-lasting durability of the Bamiyan Buddhas prior to their destruction in 2001?

choices.label: the closed standing pose and rock-cut carving technique
the monumental scale and isolation of the surrounding area
the stucco and metal that originally covered their surface
the hard imported stone that reinforced the base of the figures

content.answer: the closed standing pose and rock-cut carving technique
